content:
pchickey commented on issue #7099:

Can you take a look at #7029 and see what sort of conflicts this might produce? I would like to land that PR first if possible.

I haven't looked at the clock math but if there are issues there which you wrote a fix for here, please submit that as a separate PR and we can look at that specific issue first.

rvolosatovs commented on issue #7099:

Can you take a look at #7029 and see what sort of conflicts this might produce? I would like to land that PR first if possible.

I don't there are many, if any. If #7029 was merged first, we'd need to add the wrappers in file FD checks, but it seems that it would be the only thing.

rvolosatovs edited a comment on issue #7099:

Can you take a look at #7029 and see what sort of conflicts this might produce? I would like to land that PR first if possible.

I don't think there are many. If #7029 was merged first, we'd need to add the wrappers in file FD checks, but it seems that it would be the only thing.

rvolosatovs commented on issue #7099:

I've rebased on top of #7029, the diff is now a bit bigger, since it contains a few minor fixups for that PR focused on simplifying implementation of this feature and consistency
